data.title: MELCHIOR PALYI: INTRODUCTION AND BIOGRAPHY
data.meta_description: MELCHIOR PALYI: INTRODUCTION AND BIOGRAPHY - Author: Warren J. Samuels
data.text: F. Taylor Ostrander had three courses from Melchior Palyi at the University of Chicago during the 1933â€“1934 academic year: Economics 332 on monetary theory; 333 on business cycle theory; and 334 on the European banking system. Fellow students included Albert G. Hart, later a leading monetary economist, and Rose Director, sister of Aaron Director and later wife of Milton Friedman.
